desc: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
notes:
The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Hex disables damage block and evasion.
attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Agility
+ 35 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
HEX DURATION: 3.5
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
